title: $999 -- Ireland: 6-Night, 4-City Vacations, Inc. Car Rental
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $999 -- Ireland: 6-Night, 4-City Vacations, Inc. Car Rental $999 -- Ireland: 6-Night, 4-City Vacations, Inc. Car Rental by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - October 5, 2015 at 6:27 PM 
Aer Lingus is featuring six-night vacations to Ireland from $999 per person with air and rental car included for travel in spring 2016. You'll be treated to stays in four cities: Dublin, Kilkenny, Killarney, and Limerick. 
The deal includes: Round-trip airfare from New York City; other departure cities are available at varying rates Manual-transmission car rental with unlimited mileage for duration of vacation One night at the Aspect Hotel or the Newpark Hotel in Kilkenny Two nights at the Scotts Hotel or the International Hotel in Killarney Two nights at the Absolute Hotel or Limerick City Hotel in Limerick Two nights at the North Star Hotel or the Citywest Hotel in Dublin All local, hotel, and air taxes and fees 
How to get this deal: Visit Aer Lingus ' website. Travel at these rates is valid during various dates in April 2016 from New York City. Other departure cities and date are available at varying rates. The sale provider hasn't listed a booking deadline. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
